item.title: How to Stop Thinking About Eye Floaters
item.description:
If you’ve found yourself trapped in a mental loop — constantly noticing your eye floaters, analyzing them, wondering if they’ve changed — you’re not alone. For many people, the real challenge isn’t the floaters themselves… it’s the thoughts about them.

And that’s what we’re tackling today: how to stop thinking about eye floaters, so you can get your mind back.

The Spiral No One Talks About

You notice something drifting across your vision. You blink. You look left, then right. It’s still there.
